div.p: The status of a resource narrative
This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/narrative-status

tr.td: The contents of the narrative are entirely generated from the structured data in the resource.
The contents of the narrative are entirely generated from the structured data in the resource and some of the content is generated from extensions.
The contents of the narrative contain additional information not found in the structured data.
the contents of the narrative are some equivalent of "No human-readable text provided for this resource".

description.value: The status of a resource narrative

definition.value: The contents of the narrative are entirely generated from the structured data in the resource.
The contents of the narrative are entirely generated from the structured data in the resource and some of the content is generated from extensions.
The contents of the narrative contain additional information not found in the structured data.
the contents of the narrative are some equivalent of "No human-readable text provided for this resource".
